api_key.description: Amplitude API Key. See the setup guide for more information on how to obtain this key: https://go.estuary.dev/CTEm20

secret_key.description: Amplitude Secret Key. See the setup guide for more information on how to obtain this key: https://go.estuary.dev/CTEm20

request_time_range.description: Too big time range in request can cause a timeout error. If that happens, set shorter time interval in hours. See https://go.estuary.dev/Mr2NMb for more details.
